about_the_game:
Contents


Enhance your experience with this extraordinary DLC!

  • 12 amazing and colorful 1920 x 1080 wallpapers featuring the gorgeous characters of the game!
  • A special savefile that allows you to start with $999, a shotgun (ammo: 10) and a kalachnikov (ammo: 69)!

Details


The DLC contents will be found in your BnB folder:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Blood 'n Bikinis

The savefile needs to be copy/pasted into the following folder:
C:\Users[Name]\AppData\Roaming\BnB_Saves

name: BnB Wallpapers and Savefile

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound

short_description: Get an even bigger experience from BnB with these 12 amazing 1920 x 1080 wallpapers featuring the characters of the game and a special savefile that will turn you into a deadly heavily armed fighter!
